seller_research.name: Whatfix
seller_research.description: Whatfix is an Indian SaaS-based digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

pricing_models.type: Flat fee plus user license fees
pricing_models.description: Whatfix pricing is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees.
pricing_models.duration: Annual billing, term length varies based on contract

pricing_models.description: Whatfix offers a free plan with 30 credits.
Whatfix offers a basic plan at $39 per month.

buyer_research.name: Coca Cola
buyer_research.description: The Coca-Cola Company is an American multinational corporation founded in 1892 and today engaged primarily in the manufacture and sale of syrup and concentrate for non-alcoholic beverages.
goals: Refresh the world and make a difference
Inspire moments of optimism and happiness
Create value and make a difference
use_cases: Crafting brands and choice of drinks that people love

pains: Difficulty in achieving desired business outcomes from digital transformation initiatives
Challenges in driving user adoption of new software applications
Inefficient employee training and onboarding processes
Struggling to refresh the world and make a difference through digital channels
Difficulty in crafting brands and choice of drinks that people love through digital means
Limited visibility into user behavior and performance
Insufficient data to measure the impact of digital initiatives
Concerns about the sustainability of digital initiatives
objections: We've tried similar digital adoption platforms in the past and they didn't work out
We're not sure if Whatfix can integrate with our existing technology stack
We're concerned about the cost of implementing and scaling Whatfix
We're not convinced that Whatfix can provide a strong ROI
We're worried about the complexity of implementing Whatfix
We're not sure if Whatfix is the right fit for our specific industry needs
We're concerned about the security and compliance of Whatfix
We're not convinced that Whatfix can provide the level of customization we need
We're worried about the potential disruption to our business operations during implementation

messages.content: Hi, thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. My name is [Sales Person's Name] and I'm a sales representative from Whatfix. How are you doing today?

Hi, I'm [Buyer's Name], and I'm part of the digital transformation team at Coca Cola. I'm doing well, thank you. We're interested in learning more about Whatfix and how it can help us achieve our digital goals.
Great to hear that! Can you tell me a little bit more about your current digital transformation initiatives and what you're hoping to achieve?

We're currently undergoing a significant digital transformation to refresh the world and make a difference through digital channels. We're looking to improve our user adoption rate, maximize our technology investments, and drive business outcomes. However, we're facing challenges in achieving these goals.

I understand. It sounds like you're facing some common challenges that many of our customers have experienced. Can you tell me more about the specific pain points you're experiencing and how they're impacting your business?

One of the main challenges we're facing is the difficulty in achieving desired business outcomes from our digital transformation initiatives. We've invested heavily in new software applications, but we're struggling to get our users to adopt them effectively.

I see. That's a great use case for Whatfix. Our digital adoption platform is designed to help organizations like yours drive user adoption and maximize technology investments. Can you tell me more about your current user onboarding and training processes?

Currently, we're using a combination of manual training sessions and static guides to onboard our users. However, it's not very effective, and we're finding that our users are still struggling to adopt the new applications.

I understand. It sounds like you might be experiencing some inefficiencies in your current process. Whatfix can help you streamline your user onboarding and training processes with our in-app guidance and interactive walkthroughs. Have you considered using a digital adoption platform like Whatfix to address these challenges?

We've looked at a few different options, but we're not sure if Whatfix is the right fit for our specific needs. We're concerned about the cost and complexity of implementation, as well as the potential ROI.

I completely understand your concerns. We've worked with many enterprise organizations like Coca Cola, and we've seen significant ROI from our platform. I'd be happy to walk you through a customized ROI analysis and implementation plan to address your specific needs and concerns.

That sounds great. We'd love to learn more about how Whatfix can help us achieve our digital goals. Can you tell us more about your implementation process and what we can expect from working with Whatfix?

Absolutely. Our implementation process is designed to be flexible and scalable to meet your specific needs. We'll work closely with your team to understand your goals and requirements and develop a customized implementation plan. We'll also provide dedicated support and training to ensure a smooth transition.
That sounds great. What's the typical timeline for implementation, and what kind of budget should we expect?

The implementation timeline can vary depending on the scope and complexity of the project, but typically it takes around 6-12 weeks. As for budget, our pricing is based on a flat fee plus user license fees, and we offer flexible pricing plans to meet your specific needs.
Okay, that sounds reasonable. What's the next step in the process, and who else would need to be involved in the decision-making process?

The next step would be to schedule a demo of our platform and discuss the customized ROI analysis and implementation plan I mentioned earlier. We'll also need to involve your IT and stakeholder teams to ensure a smooth implementation. Are there any other stakeholders or teams that would need to be involved in the decision-making process?
Yes, our IT and digital transformation teams would need to be involved, as well as our stakeholders from the bottling partners and customer teams.
Okay, got it. I'll make sure to include them in the process. Thank you for your time today, and I look forward to scheduling a demo and discussing the next steps.

Inefficiencies in current user onboarding and training processes
objections: Concerns about cost and complexity of implementation

insights: Coca Cola is undergoing a significant digital transformation to refresh the world and make a difference through digital channels
Coca Cola is struggling to get users to adopt new software applications effectively
Coca Cola needs a solution to improve user adoption rate, maximize technology investments, and drive business outcomes

Need to emphasize the flexibility and scalability of Whatfix's solution to address Coca Cola's specific needs
